title: Tim Seymour: Cannabis Industry Growth Will Return In Second Half of 2022
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Tim Seymour returns to talk cannabis investing within current market conditions. Interconnectivity between asset classes in the time of war and geopolitical volatility. Legislative process, wholesale prices, compression and recent cannabis earnings. Cannabis IPOs, ETFs and looking for free cash flow generation.
content:encoded: Tim Seymour returns to talk cannabis investing within current market conditions. Interconnectivity between asset classes in the time of war and geopolitical volatility. Legislative process, wholesale prices, compression and recent cannabis earnings. Cannabis IPOs, ETFs and looking for free cash flow generation.
